All Implemented Interfaces:
IPMessage, Loggable
public final class IPv6RoutingType0Header
extends IPv6RoutingHeader

Represents an IPv6 Routing Header with routing type equal to zero.

Author:
Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)
